Easy[edit | edit source]

Each task in this tier awards 10 league points upon completion.

With 9 tasks available, there are a total of 90 league points that can be earned from easy tasks.

Name Task Skill(s) needed Other requirements
Cook a Rabbit in Tirannwn Cook a raw rabbit anywhere within Tirannwn. N/A N/A
Harvest Some Sweetcorn in Prifddinas Harvest some sweetcorn from the Prifddinas Allotment Patch. 20 Farming N/A
Cross a Trap in Isafdar Successfully cross any kind of trap in Isafdar. N/A N/A
Defeat a Waterfiend in Tirannwn Defeat a Waterfiend in Tirannwn. N/A N/A
Defeat a Moss Giant in Tirannwn Defeat a Moss Giant in Tirannwn. N/A N/A
Use the Bank in Lletya Use the bank in Lletya. N/A N/A
Find Every Memoriam Crystal Find every memoriam crystal in Prifddinas and add them to the Memoriam Device. 75 Agility N/A
Charter a Ship From Prifddinas to Port Tyras Take a Charter Ship from Prifddinas to Port Tyras. N/A 3,200gp
Talk to Ilfeen in Tirannwn Talk to Ilfeen in Tirannwn. N/A N/A

Medium[edit | edit source]

Each task in this tier awards 50 league points upon completion.

With 7 tasks available, there are a total of 350 league points that can be earned from medium tasks.

Name Task Skill(s) needed Other requirements
Check a grown Papaya Tree in Lletya Check the health of a papaya tree you've grown in Lletya. 57 Farming N/A
Craft 50 Death Runes Craft 50 death runes at the Death Altar. 65 Runecraft 90 Slayer or unlocked Wilderness
Move Your House to Prifddinas Move your player-owned house to Prifddinas. 70 Construction 50,000
Defeat an Elf in Tirannwn Defeat an Elf in Tirannwn. N/A N/A
Defeat a Bloodveld in Tirannwn Defeat a Bloodveld in Tirannwn. 50 Slayer N/A
Defeat a Kurask in Tirannwn Defeat a Kurask in Tirannwn. 70 Slayer N/A
Use an Elven Teleport Crystal Use a Teleport crystal. N/A N/A

Hard[edit | edit source]

Each task in this tier awards 100 league points upon completion.

With 19 tasks available, there are a total of 1,900 league points that can be earned from hard tasks.

Name Task Skill(s) needed Other requirements
Check a grown Crystal Tree Check the health of a Crystal tree you've grown in Prifddinas. 74 Farming and either 80 Hunter OR 80 Smithing and 80 Crafting for the acorn. N/A
Catch a Crystal Impling Catch a Crystal impling in Prifddinas. 80 Hunter N/A
Complete the Prifddinas Agility Course Complete a lap of the Prifddinas Agility Course. 75 Agility N/A
Complete the Prifddinas Agility Course in 1:10 Complete a lap of the Prifddinas Agility Course in 1:10 or less. 75 Agility N/A
Pickpocket an Elf 50 Times Pickpocket an elf 50 times. 85 Thieving N/A
Craft a Piece of Crystal Armour Use a singing bowl to craft any piece of crystal armour. 70 Smithing, 50 Crafting N/A
Complete the Gauntlet Complete the Gauntlet in Prifddinas. N/A N/A
Defeat Zalcano Defeat Zalcano in Prifddinas. N/A N/A
Defeat Zulrah Defeat Zulrah at the Poison Waste. N/A N/A
Defeat a Dark Beast in Tirannwn Defeat a Dark Beast in Tirannwn. 90 Slayer N/A
Equip a Dark Bow Equip a dark bow. 60 Ranged, 90 Slayer N/A
Defeat Zulrah in 1:30 Defeat Zulrah at the Poison Waste in 1:30 or less. N/A N/A
Complete the Gauntlet in 8:00 Complete the Gauntlet in Prifddinas in 8:00 or less. N/A N/A
Equip a Crystal Bow Equip a crystal bow. 70 Ranged, 50 Agility N/A
Equip a Crystal Shield Equip a crystal shield. 70 Defence, 50 Agility N/A
Equip a Crystal Halberd Equip a crystal halberd. 70 Attack, 50 Agility, 35 Strength Completion of the hard tier of Western Provinces Diary which requires unlocked the Kandarin region.
Defeat a Nechryael in Tirannwn Defeat a Nechryael in Tirannwn. 80 Slayer N/A
Craft an Eternal Teleport Crystal Use a Singing Bowl to craft an eternal teleport crystal. 80 Smithing, 80 Crafting N/A
Open the Enhanced Crystal Chest Open the Elven Crystal Chest in Prifddinas. 80 Smithing, 80 Crafting N/A

Elite[edit | edit source]

Each task in this tier awards 250 league points upon completion.

With 20 tasks available, there are a total of 5,000 league points that can be earned from elite tasks.

Name Task Skill(s) needed Other requirements
Dissect 50 Sacred Eels Dissect 50 Sacred eels. 87 Fishing, 72 Cooking N/A
Equip an Elven Signet Equip an Elven signet. 80 Hunter N/A
Obtain a Zalcano Shard Obtain a Zalcano shard as a drop from Zalcano in Prifddinas. N/A N/A
Equip a Full Crystal Armour Set Equip a full set of Crystal armour. 74 Smithing, 74 Crafting N/A
Complete the Corrupted Gauntlet Complete the Corrupted Gauntlet in Prifddinas. N/A N/A
Obtain a Crystal Tool Seed Obtain a Crystal tool seed as a drop from Zalcano. N/A N/A
Equip a Serpentine Helm Equip a Serpentine helm. 75 Defence, 52 Crafting N/A
Craft a Toxic Blowpipe Craft a Toxic blowpipe. 53 Fletching N/A
Craft a Toxic Trident Craft a Toxic trident. 59 Crafting, 87 Slayer Unlocked Kandarin Area
Defeat Zulrah in 0:54 Defeat Zulrah at the Poison Waste in 0:54 or less. N/A N/A
Complete the Gauntlet in 5:00 Complete the Gauntlet in Prifddinas in 5:00 or less. N/A N/A
Complete the Corrupted Gauntlet in 8:30 Complete the Corrupted Gauntlet in Prifddinas in 8:30 or less. N/A N/A
Complete the Corrupted Gauntlet in 7:00 Complete the Corrupted Gauntlet in Prifddinas in 7:00 or less. N/A N/A
Complete the Corrupted Gauntlet 100 Times Complete the Corrupted Gauntlet in Prifddinas 100 times. N/A N/A
Complete the Corrupted Gauntlet 250 Times Complete the Corrupted Gauntlet in Prifddinas 250 times. N/A N/A
Defeat Zalcano 250 Times Defeat Zalcano in Prifddinas 250 times. N/A N/A
Defeat Zalcano 500 Times Defeat Zalcano in Prifddinas 500 times. N/A N/A
Defeat Zulrah 250 Times Defeat Zulrah at the Poison Waste 250 times. N/A N/A
Defeat Zulrah 500 Times Defeat Zulrah at the Poison Waste 500 times. N/A N/A
Equip a Piece of the Dragonstone Armour Set Equip any piece of the Dragonstone armour set. 40 Defence, 80 Crafting, 80 Smithing N/A

Master[edit | edit source]

Each task in this tier awards 500 league points upon completion.

With 4 tasks available, there are a total of 2,000 league points that can be earned from master tasks.

Name Task Skill(s) needed Other requirements
Equip a Corrupted Blade of Saeldor Equip a Corrupted Blade of Saeldor. N/A N/A
Defeat Zulrah in 0:42 Defeat Zulrah at the Poison Waste in 0:42 or less. N/A N/A
Complete the Corrupted Gauntlet in 5:00 Complete the Corrupted Gauntlet in Prifddinas in 5:00 or less. N/A N/A
Equip a Crystal Crown Equip a Crystal crown. N/A 250,000,000 GP
